definition: to place upside down/to invert/to pour/to throw out/to move backwards/however/actually/as a matter of fact/contrary to expectation
to fall/to collapse/to lie horizontally/to overthrow/to fail/to go bankrupt/to change (trains or buses)/to move around/to resell at a profit
lit. to invert root and branch (idiom); fig. confusing cause and effect/to stress the incidental over the fundamental/to put the cart before the horse
to invert the importance of things (i.e. stress the unimportant and neglect the important)/lacking a sense of perspective/to put the cart before the horse

sentences.english: emptying buckets and baths, and storing them upside-down.
sentences.chinese: 排空水桶和浴盆，倒置存放。

sentences.english: In his view, people spend far too much time putting the cart before the horse.
sentences.chinese: 在他来看，人们老是本末倒置。

sentences.english: Morphology of HSV-1 was identified by inverted microscope.
sentences.chinese: 利用倒置显微镜对病毒感染进行形态学鉴定。

sentences.english: My experience with the Range Rover and Land Rover was an upside down experience.
sentences.chinese: 我对越野路华家家族的汽车的驾驶经验是本未倒置的。

sentences.english: That man has reversed Genesis- man has make God to his image and likeness.
sentences.chinese: 人却本末倒置，以自己的形像塑造天主。

sentences.english: The roofing with waterproof layer under thermal insulation layer is usually called as inversion roofing.
sentences.chinese: 通常把防水层设置在保温层之下的屋面称为倒置屋面。

sentences.english: Construction in the field have to understand before proportions.
sentences.chinese: 建设部在房价的认识上已经到了本末倒置的地步。

sentences.english: There’s certainly nothingrational about putting the cart before the horse.
sentences.chinese: 本末倒置当然没有任何理性可言。

sentences.english: METHOD Cell apoptosis was observed with inverted microscope and flow cytometer.
sentences.chinese: 方法运用倒置显微镜观察，流式细胞仪检测分析。

sentences.english: Yet perhaps there's an upside to all of this.
Betty Skelton did this while flying about three meters off the ground—upside down.
sentences.chinese: 贝蒂斯凯尔顿同时起飞下降约三米的地面，倒置。

sentences.english: This thesis goes deeply into the signal processing and the data timely processing of IGPS.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要对倒置GPS信号和数据处理进行研究。

sentences.english: Aspects are used to invert dependencies and decouple code.
sentences.chinese: 方面用于倒置依赖和解耦代码。

sentences.english: Death Inverted is the door that not close, the old habit that returns to repeat a lesson .
sentences.chinese: 倒置的死是不关上的门，回来重复一门课的老的习惯。

sentences.english: A failure of the cooling system that has crippled the entire plant led to water boiling in the No4 pool.
sentences.chinese: 整个核电站的冷却系统故障倒置四号池水燃沸。

sentences.english: Handles lateral velocity variations, velocity inversions and blind zones.
sentences.chinese: 处理横向速度变化，速度倒置和盲区。

definition: to roll/to turn over/to invert/to flip
to place/to put (at or in a position)/to be located
vertical/to erect/to set upright/vertical stroke in Chinese characters/young servant (old)
to bend/to curve around/curved/crooked/to wind/to warp
